sentences.en: A sullen stream winds its way among the trees.
sentences.cn: 一条水流滞缓的小溪蜿蜒流经树林.

sentences.en: All my attempts to amuse the children were met with sullen scowls.
sentences.cn: 我想尽办法哄这些孩子玩儿,但是他们总是满脸不高兴.

sentences.en: Bill sat in sullen silence and refused to eat his lunch.
sentences.cn: 比尔一声不响，闷闷不乐地坐着，不肯吃午饭。
鲍勃脸色苍白，闷闷不乐。

sentences.en: He looked up at the sullen sky.
sentences.cn: 他抬头看了一眼阴沉的天空.

sentences.en: He turned away in sullen, resentful silence.
sentences.cn: 他闷闷不乐、心怀怨恨、一言不发地转过身去了。

sentences.en: He was a young man with furtive eyes and a sullen look.
sentences.cn: 这人很年青,贼眉鼠眼,满脸丧气.

sentences.en: It is no use for you to look sullen.
sentences.cn: 你不用做出烦恼的神色.

sentences.en: Many of them remained sullen and resentful.
sentences.cn: 他们中有许多人还是闷闷不乐，怀恨在心。

sentences.en: Sam looked after Mr. Johnson with a sullen countenance.
sentences.cn: 塞姆闷闷不乐地目送着约翰逊先生.

sentences.en: Susan was sullen in the morning because she hadn't slept well.
sentences.cn: 苏珊今天早上郁闷不乐,因为昨晚没睡好.

sentences.en: The blue eyes were reddened and sullen with weeping.
sentences.cn: 一对碧眼哭得发红,没了光辉.

sentences.en: The offenders lapsed into a sullen silence.
sentences.cn: 那些冒犯者都闷不作声了。

sentences.en: The sullen girl refused to answer her mother's questions.
sentences.cn: 愠怒的女孩拒绝回答她母亲的问题.

sentences.en: Thereafter, Sullen whined the less, at least in Scarlett's presence.
sentences.cn: 从此以后, 苏纶就不大哭闹了, 至少在思嘉面前要好些.

sentences.en: This cut Hurstwood like a whip, and made him sullen.
sentences.cn: 这话像鞭子一样抽痛了赫斯渥, 他不高兴了.

words.tran_cn: 不高兴；闷闷不乐的样子

trans.tran_cn: 愠怒的，不高兴的，（天气）阴沉的，悲哀的，行动缓慢的
trans.tran_en: angry and silent, especially because you feel life has been unfair to you
